meanings.definition: A type of carpet with a thick pile, typically used in public transportation.
meanings.sent1: The moquettes on the bus felt soft under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The moquettes in the subway were a vibrant red color.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of a world where moquettes could fly and take us to our destinations.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of moquettes, each leading to a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The moquettes whispered stories of all the passengers who had walked on them.
